name: Snowplow Mania
description:
You drive a slightly awkward snowplow, and your job is to clear snow off the streets! Made with a simple arcade point system, where clearing snow from the street is 10 pts, and clearing other snow is -3 pts. take your time for the max score, have fun going full speed, or just enjoy the satisfaction of watching the snow disappear.

Built with Godot4, all assets made by Sir Cactuspad

NOTE: So far i've not had success with an HTML5 export, my tilemaps won't render. I don't even see any errors in the debugger. if i figure it out, I'll post a new version, but not by the Cozy jam end time.

KNOWN BUGS:

  • sometimes, clicking on the instructions button takes you to the level select page instead of the How to play page. going back and trying again will eventually work
